channel.title: PIXELWITCH - Ollama AI & Coding Blog

item.title: Getting Started with Ollama AI
item.description: An introduction to Ollama's AI platform, setup guide, and first steps to build your own AI models.

item.description: Learn how to connect Ollama AI with Python applications for powerful AI-driven features.
